hi my name is Eric Kim I'm the

everywhere change the world for

good I'm so thankful to my parents my
mother and father lived through the

States to seek a better life uh with one

did have was an education that they were

that was our big thesis when we started
the firm in 2014 at goodwi our
philosophy is that investing is both an
art and a science and so we leverage our
technology and our software to get to
the truth of the science part as quickly
as possible of our 65 66 person team
two-thirds of that team are actually
data scientists product managers and
engineers and since day one we've been
building an infrastructure a software
layer to enable us to look at consumer
technology companies so we find so much
value in looking at the data being able
to have this infrastructure to see
companies on a global basis we track
over 10 million companies in real time
so we have very very accessible reports
consumer research analytics benchmarks
that allow us to understand a company we
think better than any other firm because
we have so much data around it and we
know how to apply it so when we see a

quickly able to assess is this company
Best in Class not only on growth but

their differentiation all the hard
science of investing we've really locked

it goes with it is the art part and
that's really understanding the

will and desire to win that person's
desire to have impact Itself by taking
all the science and being able to really

you can spend a lot more time on
spending time with the entrepreneur

understanding what their long-term goal
is their vision for the company so if
you have seven days in the week in the

what makes for a great entrepreneur

one of our screening criteria if you

if that is someone's singular purpose if

a able to see the big picture always

understand what are the key risks to
